price: "E, por certo, refugio-me em meu Senhor e vosso Senhor, contra o me apedrejardes."
arabic: وَإِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۡ أَن تَرۡجُمُونِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī ʿudh'tu birabbī warabbikum an tarjumūni
